details.description:
The British Embassy offices in Rome are not open to the public. Visits are by appointment only. 
We do not answer visa enquiries.
details.access_and_opening_times:
2014 public holidays

  • Wednesday 24 December
  • Thursday 25 December
  • Friday 26 December

2015 public holidays

  • Thursday 1 January
  • Tuesday 6 January
  • Friday 3 April
  • Monday 6 April
  • Monday 27 April
  • Friday 1 May
  • Friday 22 May
  • Monday 1 June
  • Tuesday 2 June
  • Monday 29 June [Rome and Milan only]
  • Monday 31 August
  • Monday 7 December [Milan only]
  • Tuesday 8 December
  • Thursday 24 December
  • Friday 25 December

General physical access

  • Disabled access is possible through the main gate
  • Access to the 1st and 2nd floor is possible with the lifts that have doors wide enough for wheelchairs
  • There is a disabled toilet at the 2nd floor in front of the Consular/Visa office

For security reasons there is no parking available for visitors. Limited parking is available in the area, but it is extremely busy and visitors should not rely on getting a space. Parking may be requested within the grounds of the embassy in case of special need.

Contact us

If you feel that our services may be inaccessible to you, please contact our receptionists on +39 06 4220 0001 who will try and find an alternative way of providing access for you.

other.title: UK Representation to the UN Agencies for Food and Agriculture
